PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistributionChamberElementTypeFormedDuct
PropertySetDef.Definition: Space formed in the ground for the passage of pipes, cables, ducts.

PropertyDef.Name: ClearWidth
PropertyDef.Definition:
The clear width.
It indicates the formed space in the duct.

PropertyDef.Name: ClearDepth
PropertyDef.Definition:
The clear depth.
It indicates the formed space in the duct.

PropertyDef.Name: WallThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the wall construction. NOTE: It is assumed that walls will be constructed at a single thickness.

PropertyDef.Name: BaseThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the base construction, assumed to be constructed at a single thickness.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessCoverLoadRating
PropertyDef.Definition: The load rating of the access cover (which may be a value or an alphanumerically defined class rating).

PropertyDef.Name: CableDuctOccupancyRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the ratio between the number of cables in the duct and the maximum number of cables that the duct can contain.
